00120 typedef struct
00121 {
00122  UINT8 ubPossible;            // is this attack form possible?  T/F
00123  UINT8 ubOpponent;            // which soldier is the victim?
00124  UINT8 ubAimTime;                                     // how many extra APs to spend on aiming
00125  UINT8 ubChanceToReallyHit;   // chance to hit * chance to get through cover
00126  INT32 iAttackValue;          // relative worthiness of this type of attack
00127  INT16 sTarget;                                             // target gridno of this attack
00128  INT8  bTargetLevel;                            // target level of this attack
00129  UINT8 ubAPCost;                                      // how many APs the attack will use up
00130  INT8  bWeaponIn;                                     // the inv slot of the weapon in question
00131 } ATTACKTYPE;
